title: WCAS SOCIOL 404-0-20 Designs for Descriptive Causal Research in Field Settings

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course aims to make you a better producer and consumer of social science that deals with casual questions of the form: If someone does X, what then results? Such causal relations are the foundation of other more complex theories of causation that have a more explanatory flavor and that undergird practices like path analysis and multiple regression.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value:
This is a tentative booklist. Please confirm all books before purchase.
The text is by Shadish, Cook and Campbell, called Experimental and Quaso-experimental Designs. Houghton-Mifflin, 2002.

subject: SOCIOL
